itemDescription: British journalist, evangelical clergyman of the Church of England and journalist (1789–1872)

wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Charles Wilks (1789–1872) was an evangelical clergyman of the Church of England, known as a journalist.

response: Later editors were Samuel Charles Wilks (from 1816 to 1849), William Goode (from 1847 to 1849), John William Cunningham (from 1850 to 1858), and John Buxton Marsden (from 1859 to 1869).
